string.text: Well! The stash gave me a further direction for my search. I found a flash drive that Gunslinger group used as a sort of "logbook". There weren't many messages there, but it was enough to understand - Gunslinger's group, except for him, included 2 others: Ghost and Fang. A certain "mutual acquaintance" was also mentioned, but whether he was part of the group is unknown. But the fact that he was of considerable assistance to Gunslinger group is a fact. Further, Ghost reports that Fang died when they were ambushed. So... So far we have the name of one person who knows Gunslinger for a fact, and that's Ghost. Finally something concrete. And Gunslinger himself, judging by the correspondence, should really be sought in the northern parts of the Zone.

Hoplite: Hidden within the factory is the stash of the legendary stalker Gunslinger, who was rumored to be at the center of the Zone. We need to find that stash, there might be something interesting in there.
Trader: As soon as you steal the case from the former Agroprom Research Institute, bring it here.
SOS, somebody help me! I'm in the factory, upstairs.
